Nonkululeko Gobodo (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 10 n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 1960, Mthatha, Eastern Cape) ghọrọ nwanyị ojii mbụ Chartered Accountant na South Africa n'afọ 1987.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Nonkululeko kwuru okwu na KPMG, ma nye ya mmekorita, nke ọ jụrụ
Mgbe ahụ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na Transkei Development Corporation, emesịa bụrụ onye isi ego. N'ịgbaso nke ahụ, ọ tọrọ ntọala ụlọ ọrụ ndekọ ego ya Gobodo Incorporated
O nyere aka n'iduzi njikọ nke Gobodo Incorporated na SizweNtsaluba VSP n'afọ 2011 iji mepụta SizweNtsalubaGobodo, ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego ojii kachasị ukwuu na South Africa
N'afọ 2014, ọ kwụsịrị ọrụ nke onye isi oche nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
N'afọ 2016, ọ malitere Nkululeko Leadership Consulting (NLC), ụlọ ahịa, ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ndị isi ojii nwere ma na-elekọta ya na Sandton, Johannesburg
Ugbu a, ọ bụ onye isi oche na onye isi nke Leadership Consulting na NLC
Ọ bụkwa onye isi na-abụghị onye isi na PPC Ltd
